job_title: Jr. Systems and Azure Cloud Support

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, Management, or a related field.

jd: From: Vaibhav Raghuvanshi, TEK Inspirations vaibhav.raghuvanshi@tekinspirations.com Reply to: vaibhav.raghuvanshi@tekinspirations.com Hi,Hope you are doing great!!!Please share suitable profile and mention JOB Job Description -Jr. Systems / Azure Cloud Support Need strong communication, need a jr candidate (5-6 years experience)Key Responsibilities:Serve as a Jr. Systems Cloud Support engineer across multiple projects, providing solutions to complex applications, networks, and infrastructure challenges.Perform as an integration engineer to build new application environments within hosting facilities.Convert production systems from physical server environments to Azure cloud resources.Evaluate performance and recommend system improvements for both short and long-term project growth.Use architecture products to support acquisition objectives, aligning solutions with the customer’s strategic goals.Perform systems management and integration functions, including IA compliance tasks for SAN environments. Required Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, Management, or a related field.2-5 years of experience in systems engineering or analysis on large acquisition programs.Ability to work independently or with minimal supervision across multiple tasks and lead project teams.Some operational experience with DoD systems is helpful.DoD 8570 Compliant System Administrator (IAT Level II) a major plusExperience with Microsoft Azure Fundamentals.Regards,Vaibhav
